clinical_study.brief_title: Cardiac ResynchronizatiOn and arrhythmiaS Sensing Via the LEFT Bundle.
clinical_study.official_title: Cardiac ResynchronizatiOn and arrhythmiaS Sensing Via the LEFT Bundle. The CROSS LEFT Study.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of ventricular arrhythmias sensing via a left bundle branch area pacing lead.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with successful defibrillation at 35 Joules.
primary_outcome.description: After manual induction of ventricular fibrillation, a 35 Joules will be delivered with the implanted defibrillator.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from ventricular fibrillation induction to defibrillation shock.
secondary_outcome.description: After manual induction of ventricular fibrillation, the duration of appropriate ventricular sensing will be measured until the 35 Joules shock is delivered.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of appropriate and inappropriate arrhythmic episodes.
secondary_outcome.description: The occurrence of appropriately or inappropriately detected episodes with a high ventricular rate ≥170 beats-per-minute will be recorded.

arm_group.description: Patients implanted with a dual-chamber DF-1 cardioverter-defibrillator. Ventricular tachy sensing is performed via an IS-1 pacing lead placed in the interventricular septum.

intervention.description: A dual-chamber DF-1 defibrillator is implanted. Left bundle branch area pacing is performed for cardiac resynchronization therapy.

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients with an indication of a new implantation of a cardiac resynchronization therapy system.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Ischemic or non-ischemic cardiomyopathy
- Left ventricular ejection fraction ≤35% despite optimal medical therapy
- Left bundle branch block with QRS ≥130 milliseconds
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previously implanted intra-cardiac material

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD may be shared with manuscript reviewers, upon reasonable request.
